channel.title: Server Help & Commands
channel.description:
***1.) How do I log into someone elses server because it isnt working for me, I keep on getting messages telling me theres an error.
2.) What are the teleport numbers.
This game is extremely boring without having any contract whatso-ever with other players.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 09, 2007, 04:41:50 PM[/size][hr]Help would be very appreciated.

item.title: Server Help & Commands
item.dc:creator: @Lizard2 Lizard2
item.description:
@Lizard2 wrote:

Wow! Very informative. Thankyou.
I am gonna try it now and see if it works, I will keep you posted.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 09, 2007, 05:01:19 PM[/size][hr]I found one that uses Hamachi, its called “PhatPkerScape.” I am going to try it now and see if it works.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 09, 2007, 05:34:42 PM[/size][hr]and by the way, when I said tele numbers, I meant like the teleports to various runescape cities like varrock, or fallador for example.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Help & Commands
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

[quote=“driger, post:5, topic:91924”]Ok i can help you.

STEP 1:

Ok… first off, you need the moparscape client wich i’m sure you have.

Step 2:
CLICK “START SERVER”
Theres a log in section that looks like this:

Username: YOURUSERNAME
password: ********* (Whatever you want.)
server ip: <-------------------- see step 3

Step 3:
go to server advertisments:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


Find a server that looks cool and click on it.
Here is where people like… advertise their server. They will show

name: bla bla bla
server ip: bla bla bla
hamachi:… <------ this is kinda confusing so if your new, use the peoples servers that or no-ip. like this: Example.no-ip.info
ALSO MAKE SURE YOU SEE WHAT THERE PORT IS, RIGHT CLICK FILE AND CHANGE THE PSORT TO WHAT THEY HAVE!!!

But if you want hamachi heres a link:

Download.com

Hamachi - Free downloads and reviews - CNET Download.com

hamachi free download - LogMeIn Hamachi, LogMeIn Hamachi, Hamachi Sushi, and many more programs


or…
https://secure.logmein.com/home.asp
go there and download one.

So pretty much just get an id and log in, hope this has helped!!!

~Driger~[/quote]Umm…i just said all that, but in noob terms already. lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Help & Commands
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

Ok, so…go to the server advertisement section on these forums. Then look at any server topic where they advertise their’s. It should say if they have hamachi or not, there used to be a layout where it was like Hamachi: Yes/No but now you gotta look deeper in the topic.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Help & Commands
item.dc:creator: @Lizard2 Lizard2
item.description:
@Lizard2 wrote:

How can I tell if it is a Hamachi server or not?

I am new to all this.
Thanks for the help.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Help & Commands
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

K, well their server could not be up. If you go onto another server you need to use the moparscape webclient, or moparscape client download. Type in any username and password you desire (not your runescape login) and then type the Server IP in with the server IP (pretty self-explanatory). Then, port is most likely 43594, but check the server topic to make sure it is the right IP and port. Then, if it is a hamachi server. Simply go to hamachi.cc and download hamachi there, then connect to their network…And what do you mean “what are the teleport numbers”?

Phew. That was a mouthful.

Read full topic
